game.name: Dream Sense
game.desc:
Description: Monsters from the dream world have disguised themselves and invaded the real world. Luckily you are a psychic.
Your dream sense allows you to look into the dream world. Use your psychic blast power to blast monsters away. This only works in the real world
Controls: * Mouse / Arrow Keys - Move crosshairs for your psychic blast * Left Click / X - Psychic blast * Right Click / Z - Toggle dream sense
